mapper.sql: select t.STUDENT_ID as studentId,a.name as studentName,a.CLASS_ID as classId,CONCAT(c.name,CONVERT(b.SEQ,char),'Áè≠') as className, group_concat(t.`SUBJECT` ORDER BY t.subject ) as groupName from t_student_subject_select t left join t_student a on t.STUDENT_ID = a.STUDENT_ID left join t_school_class b on a.CLASS_ID = b.CLASS_ID left join t_grade c on b.grade_id = c.grade_id
